p: A successful low-cost approach was developed to map A. longifolia flowering using UAV. Mapping of A. longifolia flowering is the first step on establishing a method for monitoring the effect of the biocontrol agent T. acaciaelongifoliae. And while we failed to establish a predictive relationship between area of flower cover and number of flowers, we believe that this method can be used for monitoring the expected decrease of the production of flowers.
